action.primary: Dispels Wind, unblocks the channels and collaterals and eliminates Dampness

indications: Painful obstruction when there is also Heat

action.primary: Promotes urination, resolves toxicity and reduces swellings

indications: Fevers, sores boils, snake and insect bites

contraindications: Use with caution for those with Yin Deficiency.

notes: Rx. Aristolochiae seu Cocculi governs Wind Qi as it disseminates and unblocks and it drains water pathogens from the organs. Rx. Stephaniae Tetrandrae #{HanFangJi} Han Fang Ji governs water Qi and drains Damp Excess from the channels and collaterals. .
